The Process of KDD (2/2)
(flat files,
spreadsheets,
Database tables)
▪ Postprocessing
– Ensures that only valid and useful results are incorporated into the 
decision support system
– Examples
• Visualization
• Hypothesis testing (to eliminate spurious data mining results)
